content: 13 14 15 16 sts decrease 12 13 14 15 16 sts rem round 17 *p2tog repeat from * to last 0 1 0 1 0 st s p0 1 0 1 0 6 6 7 7 8 sts decrease 6 7 7 8 8 sts rem finishing break yarn leaving a 6 /15 cm tail and thread tapestry needle with tail weave the tail through the remaining live stitches and pull tight to cinch closed secure tail to the inside of the hat weave in the tail from the cast on wet block gently and allow to dry flat to maintain shape trim ends wear this proudly and in solidarity with our ukrainian friends copyright 2022 by casapinka thank you for knitting my design feel free to share sell or duplicate this design with credit given to casapinka when doing so instagram casapinka facebook casapinka ravelry group casapinka pattern assistance casapinkahelp@gmail com ripples make waves hat © 2022 casapinka and sharon from security jeez page | 5
